name: Typhlosion ex
author: Mitsuhiro Arita

poke_power.name: Bursting Up
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn when you play Typhlosion ex from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, count the number of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. You may search your deck for up to that number of {R} Energy cards and attach them to 1 of your {R} Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Kindle
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy card attached to Typhlosion ex and then discard an Energy card attached to the Defending Pokémon.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
